title: Software Engineer
description: Designing and developing middleware APIs using Java, Spring Boot, Apache Camel, and Talend for banking and enterprise systems. Built full-stack property leasing applications using Spring Boot, React, Mapbox, and TypeScript. Deployed and maintained solutions on GCP and AWS EKS using Azure DevOps for CI/CD.

title: Java Developer (Technical Consultant)
description: Developed middleware applications using Java and Spring Boot for enterprise system integration. Built automated data pipelines and services to synchronize information between BMC Remedy, Traveloka, and Documentum. Delivered scalable microservices deployed on Linux servers and containerized with Docker.

title: Java Bootcamp
description: Completed intensive Java training focused on backend development using Spring Boot and Spring MVC. Created healthcare dashboards and backend services to process data according to BPJS and INACBG standards.

title: Web Developer
description: Developed and maintained web applications for company operations and digital presence using PHP and Laravel. Customized and optimized WordPress websites with SEO best practices.

title: Bachelor of Informatics
description: Graduated with a concentration in software engineering. Completed freelance projects including inventory systems, e-commerce platforms, and business web applications.
